data.eml:eml: Seven new species and one new species record of Sabatieria (Nematoda: Comesomatidae) from the continental slope of New Zealand

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Leduc, Daniel (2013): Seven new species and one new species record of Sabatieria (Nematoda: Comesomatidae) from the continental slope of New Zealand. Zootaxa 3693 (1): 1-35, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3693.1.1
